goal: I'm setting up a home podcast studio. Please search Omnizon for three items: a 'Rode PodMic', a 'Focusrite Scarlett 2i2' audio interface, and 'XLR cables (2-pack)', ensuring all are currently in stock. Then, draft an email to my co-host at podcastpals@email.net with the subject 'Studio Gear List' containing the individual product links and the total estimated cost for all three items.
